workflow.title: RCOMM 2012 Sudoku Challenge: 0 - Get Data
workflow.description: Process from the http://rcomm2012.org live data mining challenge. The task was to partially solve a Sudoku puzzle by solving three subtasks. Processes 1-3 in this pack are the solutions to the actual tasks, process 0 loads the required data into your repository and process 4 is the bonus that solves the entire puzzle.This process loads the two required data sets from rapid-i.com and stores them in your repository. The first data set contains the numbers 1 to 9 and the second contains the predefined values in a Sudoku. See the comment of process 1 for more details on the format.
